roleset.name: bring shame upon
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class amuse-31.1. No framenet mappings.Comparison to 'dishonor'. Framed by Katie.

example.name: example with both args
example.text: I have dishonoured my name by serving two masters.

roleset.name: refuse to accept
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie.

example.name: rejecting item
example.text: The store dishonors checks and drafts.

roleset.name: force to have sex against one's will
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie.

example.name: example with both args
example.text: Astolfo had dishonoured her even though he was reluctant to marry her.
example.arg: even though he was reluctant to marry her.
